thread.title: No apology for questioning Ben Carson’s Seventh-day Adventist faith
thread.title_full: No apology for questioning Ben Carson’s Seventh-day Adventist faith - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: No apology for questioning Ben Carson’s Seventh-day Adventist faith
text: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said Sunday that he didn't say "anything bad" about rival Ben Carson being a Seventh-day Adventist and saw no reason to apologize for raising the issue during a recent campaign rally. "I would certainly give an apology if I said something bad about it. But I didn't. All I said […] ...
